paragraph: Now, in the city, Sarah Chen, a internal affairs detective, must expose a corrupt police captain before a deadline. When threats to her career and life forces Sarah Chen to commit, there is no turning back. After a brutal setback, Sarah Chen realizes the old belief was false and must now change tactics in line with the moral premise. Pressure escalates until only one final path remains, leaving no choice but to drive toward the endgame. In a final confrontation, Sarah Chen faces the opposition and wins, achieving the goal.
moral_premise: People succeed when they act with courage, and they fail when they protect themselves at the cost of justice.

When threats to her career and life forces Sarah Chen to commit, there is no turning back.
After a brutal setback, Sarah Chen realizes the old belief was false and must now change tactics in line with the moral premise.
Pressure escalates until only one final path remains, leaving no choice but to drive toward the endgame.
In a final confrontation, Sarah Chen faces the opposition and wins, achieving the goal.
